sentences.en: Brief, focused chapters make this an ideal tool for board examinations and recertification as well as preparation before surgery.
sentences.cn: 集中章的摘要使这一理想工具给板检查和在诊所之前换发新证和准备。

sentences.en: Certifications which have been revoked may only be reinstated by full examination and recertification per Section 6.0 of this written practice.
sentences.cn: 被取消的认证，必须重新通过本书面实施细则第6.0条规定的全部考试之后，才可恢复认证。

sentences.en: If the gray box with the arrow is not displayed on the certification track you earned, the recertification requirement for this track is currently not available or no longer available.
sentences.cn: 如果在您获得的认证旁没有显示带箭头的灰格子，即是表明该重新认证目前没有新的要求或者要求已经不复存在。

sentences.en: Thus, there's no need to re-commission field loops or perform time-consuming safety system recertification .
sentences.cn: 因此，没有必要重新布置回路或是为耗时的安全系统重新换发新证。
